item.title: Barriers to Communication & How to Overcome them
item.description: Whilst presenting or trying to communicate a message, there are often many barriers and issues that must be considered before presenting to ensure that your communication is effective. This post will examine them and look at the ways these barriers can be overcome. Language Barrier Not everyone in the world speaks the same language and will be able to understand yours, meaning that people who speak a different language to you won’t be able to understand your message.
